input_text:
Job Title: Account Manager, Employee Benefits

Location: Wichita, KS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
What You’ll Do

Supports and demonstrates IMA’s core valuesValues and understands the importance of diversity, equity, and inclusion among all IMA associatesClient serviceMaintains regular, professional contact to create and foster relationships with client representativesResearches and resolves issues and requests in a timely manner – including issues that require direct interactionsAnswers questions related to benefits programConducts reviews and works to provide guidance on compliance related mattersClient meetingsAssists in and prepares materials and collateral for meetings and discussionsActively participates in discussionsRecords and reports meeting discussion s and action items Carrier and vendor managementAssists new vendor/carrier implementationsReviews carrier, vendor, and plan documents and contractsMaintains regular contact with carrier and vendor representatives to ensure client advocacy and that issues are being resolved in a timely mannerCommunication and educationWorks with client to develop short and long-term employee communication objectivesCreates member facing collateral pieces to promote and clarify benefit program featuresAssists with in person, virtual, and telephonic sessions to provide information and plan details to participantsUses regular interactions to update clients on carrier and vendor partner features and servicesInternal partnershipsActively participates and contributes to client service team operationsEffectively communicates client updates to appropriate team membersAssists with other team duties as needed – i.e., position vacancy, cover personal time off, etc.
 You Should Have: 

Attains and maintains state life and health license in accordance with IMA standardsBachelor’s degree in relevant field or equivalent job experience2 or more years of relevant experienceIntermediate MS office skills (specifically PowerPoint, Outlook, Word, and Excel)Ability to learn and work in agency/client management systems and other related software and technology platformsAbility to work independentlyIntermediate interpersonal communication skills – written and oral – with the ability to articulate ideas and information in a clear and concise mannerDemonstrates critical thinking and problem solvingAbility to present information in a group setting (in person and virtually)Intermediate organizational skills including the ability to manage multiple projects with variable deadlinesPossesses high degree of diplomacy and tact while maintaining confidentially


This Job Description is not a complete statement of all duties and responsibilities comprising this position.

The IMA Financial Group, Inc. provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability or genetics. In addition to federal law requirements, The IMA Financial Group, Inc. complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.

Compensation & Benefits

Being a part of IMA has its benefits. When you become part of the IMA family, you become eligible to take part in our valuable benefits and rewards package designed to benefit you, your family, and your life. Our plans are cost-effective, convenient and provide progressive ways for staying healthy, protecting loved ones, pursuing financial security and living a full and balanced life. This role is eligible for the following:

Annual Performance Bonus, Stock Purchase, Medical Plans, Prescription Drugs, Dental, Vision, Family Assistance Program, FSA, HSA, Pre-Tax Parking Plan, 401(k), Life/AD&D, Accident, Critical Illness, Hospital Indemnity, Long Term Care, Short-term Disability, Long-term Disability, Business Travel Accident, Identity Theft, Paid Time Off,Flexible Work Options, Paid Holidays, Sabbatical, Gift Matching, Health Club Reimbursement, Personal and Professional Development.

 Why Join IMA? 

 We’ve built a reputation for putting our associates first 

What if we told you that you could be an integral part of an entrepreneurial, expanding company, develop lasting relationships, earn competitive benefits, plus claim part ownership? It’s this unique ownership business model that makes working at IMA so appealing.

 We work in teams. We sell in teams. We win and prosper as a team 

We provide support systems and resources that enable each of our associates to focus on what they do best. And as an independent company based in the Midwest, we’re big enough to write business all over the world and small enough to implement your ideas quickly.

We are recognized nationally as a leader in our industry.

 2020-2023 Business Insurance Magazine Best Places to Work in Insurance  2023 Inc. Magazine’s Best Workplaces  2023 Denver Business Journal’s Best Places to Work  2022-2023 Connecticut Top Work Places  2021-2023 Inc. 5000’s List of Fastest Growing Companies  2019-2022 Civic 50 Colorado Honoree Recognizing 50 Most Community-Minded Companies  2022-2023 Kansas City Business Journal’s Best Places to Work  2021-2023 Charlotte Business Journal’s Best Places to Work  2021-2023 Los Angeles Business Journal’s Best Places to Work  2021-2023 The Salt Lake City Tribune Top Work Places  2021-2022 Puget Sound Business Journal’s Washington’s Best Workplaces  2021-2022 Wichita Business Journal’s Best Places to Work, #1 in extra-large category  2021 Dallas Business Journal’s Best Places to Work  2021 Alaska Journal of Commerce’s Best Workplaces in Alaska  2021 Wichita Business Journal’s Fastest Growing Companies List

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Account Manager, Employee Benefits
output_json.summary: Supports and demonstrates IMA’s core values, maintains regular professional contact with clients, conducts reviews and works on compliance related matters, assists in client meetings, and actively participates in discussions.
